Full → empty: red ← green ← blue ← red
Full → empty: red → green → blue → red

Show lights for all doze events and not just notifications

Sets the ambient light animation duration
Set max repeat count. 0 for infinite
Enables access to recovery and bootloader

Enable the accent color tint on the QS tiles
Hide the lock icon on lockscreen

Disable night light on lockscreen if FOD is active. Disabling this option might affect your fingerprint accuracy with night light on

Enable lockscreen notifications with semi-transparent backgrounds

Must be in DateFormat eg. MM/dd/yy
Choose the default behavior when connected to a device via USB
For all changes to take effect, a SystemUI restart is required. Restart SystemUI now?

Select an image to use for static mode

For better visibility on bright images
Show gradient below status bar in QS panel
Scrolling cache may improve scrolling performance at the cost of memory

Block all headsup notifications except calls

Try detecting and adding gaming apps automatically

Enable with battery saver to increase power savings

Show arrow keys on navbar while typing

Show media player as a notification.\nRequires a SystemUI restart
Allow apps to bypass security systems by pretending to be a different app
Double tap on the status bar to put the device to sleep
Double tap anywhere on the lockscreen to put phone to sleep
When the screen is off, long-pressing the volume keys will seek music tracks
